Foreign_subscription

Superclass representing the local record for a foreign user subscribing to a local one.

Properties

  • __table = ‘foreign_subscription’; // table name
  • service - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • subscriber - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • subscribed - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • created - datetime() not_null

schemaDef

public static function schemaDef()

Returns an array representing the table schema in the DB.

public static function schemaDef()
Returns an array representing the table schema in the DB.
